title: Winning with Irelia and Hecarim should give half the LP until they are rightfully nerfed

replies.body: i hope you werent expecting upvotes.
People who are downvoting abuse champions like that, so they get butthurt about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Axtrous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9zAyRAgw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-20T07:08:38.105+0000)
>
> People who are downvoting abuse champions like that, so they get butthurt about it.

So you should gain half the LP for playing a champion that is strong? That is honestly dumb as fuck.
How about stop playing pussy champions.

Look at my above post to see why Hecarim and Irelia are not pussy champions.

And below for why LB isn't either.

Seriously dude....every champion can be countered.

Hell, if you are skilled enough you can take on any champion with champs that are countered by them.

Yes, some champs are a bit cheezy with their kits, but they have counters.

Naaaah, it's logic, mate.

Pro-players should have to win twice as many matches in LCS if they take a power-pick.
No ppl down vote him because he is butthurt about losing to ppl that can bring the best out of those champions.
Same thing could be argued with LeBlanc right now.

Potential 3 flashes and able to go back to where she started with 2, and her r,q combo with thunder lords with a w initiative, instant killing any squishy target and going back to her w, is clearly fair. Yeah, you're right.

Snares, roots, and stuns prevent her from going back.

And AP crushers like Maokai and Galio can wreck an LB.
Don't forget the infamous Morgana mid.

Perhaps you need to learn how to fight Irelia and Hecarim.

Hecarim can be taken down by vision and cc.

Irelia by kiting and cc.

Also, I'm pretty sure that hecarim requires that he get fed early.  So, logic dictates that if you play really passive to him during the first 15 mins or so, he will be a wuss for the rest of the game.  Not sure about irelia, though.  cc always works.
WHY IS THE A POST WHAT.
